main event: An unidentified object was observed using ground radar in Lake Charles, Louisiana, on February 11, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting involved a single object that appeared and disappeared,Air traffic noted the presence of aircraft in the area during the event,The witnesses described the object as being grey in color and emitting no sound,The object was observed for over 30 minutes,There were no balloons released in the area at the time of the observation.
sighted object: unidentified object observed via ground radar
witness description: A 32-year-old male blacksmith residing in Lake Charles, Louisiana.
